thread.section_title: Barracuda Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Barracuda | barracuda.co
thread.title: Rynn Johnson

author: Rynn Johnson
title: Rynn Johnson
text:
Wanted to love it- after all, it has a battery charger and laptop tray- perfect! But, the frills mean nothing if it isn't constructed well. Handle wouldn't go down first trip out. Second trip out, the zipper broke. Not worth the money at this point until they fix the table stakes items for frequent travelers.
Customer service was poor- submitted request and never got a response. No number to call - only email. I would say go above and beyond if you want raving fans. We realize that it's a start up but then work to fix the problems.
